title: Carbon Black Cloud - Alerts
description: This provides a real-time overview of alerts categorized by severity, status, threats, devices, and processes for efficient monitoring and response.

definition.content:
This dashboard provides a centralized view of security alerts, enabling rapid detection and analysis of threats based on severity, type, and behavior. It supports threat prioritization, policy evaluation, and investigation of process activity, reputation, and sensor response across endpoints.

For more information, see the [Carbon Black Cloud Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/carbon_black_cloud/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.

definition.title: Alerts Eligible for Review by MDR Analysts
Alerts not Eligible for Review by MDR Analysts
